content: spring is here and it s the perfect time to set up this decoy hornet s nest hornets are territorial and will not build their nest where others are present this pattern works up quickly if you use grocery/store bags to fill it it will give it a more natural lumpy look do not copy or sell pattern as your own please give credit to tis but a stitch you can follow me on instagram tiktok or facebook you are free to sell finished items from this pattern
